name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered Greek yogurt with fresh fruits, granola, and honey. Healthy and filling breakfast or snack.

instructions.instruction: Wash strawberries and slice. Slice banana.
In tall glasses or jars, add 1/3 of yogurt. Divide equally between containers.
instructions.tip: Clear glasses show off the beautiful layers.

instructions.instruction: Add half the berries - strawberries and blueberries on yogurt layer.
Sprinkle half the granola over fruit.
instructions.tip: Add granola just before eating to keep it crunchy.

instructions.instruction: Add half of remaining yogurt on top.
Place banana slices and remaining fruit.
Add remaining granola, almond slices, and chia seeds.
Drizzle honey on top and serve immediately.
instructions.tip: Can substitute maple syrup for honey.

tips: Greek yogurt has 2x more protein than regular yogurt.
Add granola at the last moment to maintain crunch.
Can prepare in jar and take to work - keep granola separate.
Reduce or skip honey for less sugar.
storageInfo: Can be prepped night before without granola. Add granola fresh.
servingSuggestion: Serve for breakfast, pre-workout, or afternoon snack.
variations: Add protein powder to boost protein content.
Tropical version: Use mango, pineapple, and coconut flakes.
